statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, public_key FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE public_key LIKE '%abc%' AND username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR username = 'alice' ORDER BY user_id ASC, username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE blockchain_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-1234-5678-90abcdef1234' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vote_choice FROM votes WHERE blockchain_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM votes GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT user_id, vote_choice FROM votes WHERE user_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND vote_choice IN ('Yes', 'No') ORDER BY vote_choice ASC;

SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, candidate FROM votes WHERE vote_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, auth_token FROM authentication WHERE expire_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN authentication ON users.user_id = authentication.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, vote_date FROM votes WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY vote_date DESC;
SELECT user_id FROM votes WHERE candidate = 'Alice' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE expire_date > '2022-09-30' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, party_name FROM candidates ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(vote_id) AS total_votes FROM votes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash FROM blockchain WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, party_name, manifesto FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM votes GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_votes > 2;
SELECT * FROM blockchain WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY block_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;

SELECT username, public_key FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE candidate_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, public_key FROM users;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_id FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
